short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to search Saskatoon Public Library (SPL)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See for books, music and more at Saskatoon Public Library as you browse the internet.

Select a text (book  or author name) and then click on the extension to search the Saskatoon Public Library for selected text
